root: ^Mom: Come on Soul, are you ready?
^Mom: Your friends will arrive in any minute now, go wait by the door.
^Comming down the stairs Soul hears someone ring the doorbell.
^???: Good night Ms. Timber! We came to get Soul! Are you ready, Soul?
^Mom: Hello Ms. Damant, thankyou for taking care of the kids tonight.
^Ms. D: Oh, it's a pleasure. We will have so much fun.
^Soul walks to the door and greets everyone, waving a hand under the ghost costume.
^Mom: There you go, have fun little one! And please, don't get distracted, stay with the group!
^Soul is very excited to go trick or treating with some friends. It's not every day you can go outside dressed like a ghost and meet other people with scary costumes!
^Halloween is awesome. In fact, every single fantastic creature is awesome. Or that's what Soul thinks.
^Wouldn't it be the perfect Halloween night if only you could get to meet one of those creatures for real?
^That sounded like a dream for little Soul, looking at anyone who walked near them as if that could be a real  magical creature.
^Ms. D: Soul, don't fall behind the group, you'll get lost!
^Every few minutes, Ms. Damant had to call for Soul so the kid wouldn't get lost in between all the people in the streets.
^It was only a matter of time before that happened.
^Ms. D: Soul? Soul! Oh no! Where'd that kid go?
^Little Soul didn't know that there where fire flights in that village. But there it was, a tiny light in the middle of the street, just floating around.
^Suddenly, the light begin moving away and Soul couldn't do anything but follow it.
